snippet: The top-seeded Orange sounded a defiant note after they learned that their starting center had been ruled ineligible for the N.C.A.A. tournament.
abstract: College Basketball Notebook; members of top-seeded Syracuse men's basketball team sound a defiant note after learning that their starting center Fab Melo has been ruled ineligible for the NCAA tournament; say they can still win despite losing Melo; other college basketball items noted.

byline.original: By SAM BORDEN, RAY GLIER and GREG BISHOP

lead_paragraph: The top-seeded Orange sounded a defiant note after they learned that their starting center had been ruled ineligible for the N.C.A.A. tournament.

headline.seo: Syracuse Players Say They Can Win Without Fab Melo
headline.main: Defiant Orange Players Say They Can Still Win
headline.print_headline: Defiant Orange Players Say They Can Still Win
